title: What’s the future of tech in the classroom? Find out at the 21K School webinar - YourStory
content: What’s the future of tech in the classroom? Find out at the 21K School webinar  YourStory
description: YourStory in partnership with  21K School is organising a webinar that delves deeper into next-generation technology to spark the future of education. To be a part of the event, and hear educators and experts discuss the same
